eventTitle: BORIS [ BELIEVE Sightseeing Cruise ] SUNDAY MAY 23
eventDescription:
Super excited to announced the one and only New York finest legend Dj-producer BORIS to our May calendar! The Believe sightseeing cruise is the last but definitely no the lease of our Klandest boat announcements for the month!

For the Transmit recording boss label it's all about the music. New York stalwart and beloved DJ, Boris. lives by that statement. A career forged over decades of long nights in the big Apple's most revered rooms. Boris will is constantly on the tips of the younger generation's tongue. Why? Because talent, like wine, gets better with age.

Are you a believer? Believe you will dance all day long!

Opening set by raising superstar Niia Guerra

Capacity is very limited! 2 floors. Notice this is a fully heated boat both inside our main floor and outside on our deck/terrace floor with 360 sky views.

Tables packages strongly recommended and are including admission for 4/ 6 / 8 / 10 /12 people tables available.

You will be boarding the Jewel Cruise one of the finest boats in the city. Newly renovated with amazing LED builded in lights, top of the line sound with brand new interiors and last but not lease a breathtaking terrace with complete full view of New York. A 4 hours ride will take you around Hudson rive passing by the statute of liberty and experiencing beautiful NYC skyline sunset.

Boarding starts at 1pm.

Tables RSVP/ VIP or Any questions text 347.620.6024. (We only reply text).

General admission tickets now on sale while supplies last.

Food will be available for purchase.

*** Covid guidelines must be followed *** Strictly limited capacity/ Mask are mandatory/ Temperature taken at the door/ Outdoor Areas only/ Hand sanitizers/ Intimate + Secluded tables.

All sales are final. Rise or shine. This is a completely legal sightseeing cruise.

eventTitle: Prince Purple Rain at Dreamland Roller Disco at Lakeside
eventDescription:
Lola Star's Dreamland Disco is back for the Spring + Summer 2021 Season with more socially distanced roller disco MAGIC!

*Please note: this event is 21+ (Valid Photo ID required for entry)

Lola Star’s Dreamland Roller Disco at Lakeside in Prospect Park is a themed, dress up, immersive roller skating experience that will transport you into a fabulous retro roller disco “dreamland.”

Each Dreamland Roller Disco includes

  • Retro DJs spinning the hottest dance floor grooves from the 70s, 80s, 90s and today
  • An MC who narrates the spectacle as it unfolds
  • Tons of rad, Instagram-able moments including a red carpet where you can take photos
  • Birthday shout-outs - bring your birthday crew, the party is ON
  • and more exciting surprises!

COVID-19 SAFETY GUIDELINES

● Attendance at our events will be drastically limited to ensure social distancing on and off the rink.

● We will be taking guest temperature upon entry to the event.

● Skaters must remain at least six feet apart from other skaters while on the rink, sitting on benches and waiting for restroom unless you are part of the same party.

● All individuals entering the facility must wear face coverings. Face coverings must be worn at all times, even while skating

● Hand sanitizer will be available for skaters.

● Guests should wash their hands promptly if you touch your face, following hand-washing guidelines, using soap and water for at least 20 seconds

● Guests must stay home if you feel sick or have a fever.

● Rental Skates will be cleaned and sanitized after every use.

● Lockers and restrooms are cleaned and sanitized regularly

● All roller rink staff are required to wear face coverings and complete daily temperature checks.

EVENT TIME

7:00PM - 10:00PM

Doors open at 6:30PM and Access to the rink starts starts promptly at 7:00PM

2021 THEMES

April 23 - Soul Train

April 30 - 90s Hip Hop

May 7 - Mean Girls vs Clueless - 90s and 00s Pop

May 14 - Beyoncé

May 21 - Saturday Night Fever

May 28 - Prince Purple Rain

June 4 - Boy Bands vs Girl Pop

June 11 -Gaga vs Madonna

June 18 - Soul Train

June 25 - 90s Hip Hop

July 2 - Taylor Swift vs Justin Bieber

July 9 - Roll Bounce - Retro Roller Rink Classics

July 16 - Britney vs Rihanna

July 23 - Spice Girls in Xanadu

July 30 - Beyoncé vs Jay-Z

Aug 6 - Dancing Queen - Disco

Aug 13 - 90s Hip Hop

Aug 23 - 00s Girl Power - Taylor Swift, Katy Perry, Miley Cyrus

Aug 27 - Bowie vs Freddie - Glam Rock, Queen

Sept 3 - Beverly Hills 90210 - 90s Pop

Sept 10 - Beyoncé

Sept 17 - Shimmer Disco

Sept 24 - 90s Hip Hop

Oct 1 - Prince Purple Rain

Oct 8 - Soul Train

Oct 15 - Mean Girls vs Clueless - 90s and 00s Pop

Oct 22 - Zombie Disco

DRESS UP

Dress up in the most fabulous, retro inspired outfit in your closet and join us on the dance floor! Retro Roller Disco outfits, glitter, sparkle, glitz & glam costumes are highly recommended! (but not mandatory)

WALK-UP / DAY OF TICKET SALES POLICY

If the event is not sold out in advance, day of, walk up sales will only be allowed on a first come first serve basis at the door (Price: $26/PP). If the event is sold out, tickets may also become available if there are any cancellations or no-shows for existing ticket holders. Please be aware that there is no guarantee you will be able to purchase a ticket the day of the event. Thank you for your understanding.

SKATE RENTALS

Skate Rentals are included in your Admission ticket!

Our skate rentals go up to a size 15. You are welcome to bring your own roller skates or roller blades to wear. The rink is a polished concrete surface. Indoor wheels are recommended.

PROTECTIVE GEAR

Helmets, knee pads, and wrist pads are available to rent.

Helmets: $6 / Knee Pads: $3 / Wrist Pads: $3

Roller Skating is a sport. If you do not want to accept the risks involved in roller skating, we advise you to refrain from participating. All guests are required to sign an acknowledgement of risk release form before entry into Dreamland Roller Disco.

LOCKERS

Small: $3 / Large: $8

CAFE & BAR

Lakeside offers a variety of food and beverage options from our outdoor bar, including beer, wine and specialty cocktails!

PRO TIPS

  • We are operating at a very limited and reduced capacity so please buy your tickets in ADVANCE. Lola Star Dreamland Disco Events were SOLD OUT last year and this year we will have far fewer tickets.
  • We strongly recommend arriving before 8:30pm as Skate Rentals are not guaranteed due to limited supply. 
  • Be sure to CONFIRM your requested DATE in your order prior to completing your purchase.

TICKET & PACKAGE RATES

  • Advance General Admission: $24/person 
  • General Admission and Drink Ticket: $32/person
  • VIP Table Package (for 4 guests): $160
  • VIP Table Package (for 10 guests): $395

(includes event admission and skate rentals)

HOST YOUR PARTY AT DREAMLAND ROLLER DISCO

We would love to celebrate with you and your roller disco crew and make your birthday, graduation, bachelor or bachelorette, team victory (and more) party a super fun and memorable occasion. 

Solid Gold Disco Queen/King Package (minimum of 15 guests) - $725

  • VIP admission
  • Skate rentals
  • Private Party room rental
  • Buckets of Beer and Wine
  • Platter of Mozzarella Sticks, Chips & Dip, Fries
  • Add additional guests for $50/person
  • Must be booked 2 weeks in advance
  • Inquire within at Events@lakesidebrooklyn.com

Roller Disco Birthday Party Package (minimum of 15 guests) - $825

  • VIP admission
  • Skate rentals
  • Private Party room rental
  • Birthday Decor
  • Birthday Shout out by the MC
  • Option to participate in the “Birthday Dance Party”
  • Buckets of Beer and Wine
  • Complimentary Bottle of Champagne
  • Assorted Sandwich Platter, Chips & Dip, Fries
  • Add additional guests for $55/person
  • Must be booked 2 weeks in advance
  • Inquire within at Events@lakesidebrooklyn.com

Bachelorette/Bachelor Celebration Package (minimum of 15 guests) - $825

  • VIP admission
  • Skate rentals
  • Private Party room rental
  • Bachelorette/Bachelor Party Decor
  • Special Shout out to the Bachelorette/Bachelor and their crew by the MC
  • Buckets of Beer and Wine
  • Complimentary Bottle of Champagne
  • Assorted Sandwich Platter, Chips & Dip, Fries
  • Add additional guests for $55/person
  • Must be booked 2 weeks in advance
  • Inquire within at Events@lakesidebrooklyn.com

Taxes and/or Fees apply to all ticket types and packages

DIRECTIONS

Subway: B, Q, and S trains to Prospect Park station

Vehicles are not allowed inside Prospect Park. Only street parking is available.

FINE PRINT

  • Lola Star's Dreamland Disco advance tickets and packages are only valid for the date indicated on the receipt. Tickets/Packages are non-refundable and non-transferable. All sales are final.
  • Doors open at 6:30pm. Access to the Rink starts promptly at 7:00pm.
  • Rain or Shine. Please check www.lakesidebrooklyn.com in case of extreme weather conditions for any cancellations.
  • We strongly recommend arriving before 8:30pm as Skate Rentals are not guaranteed due to limited supply. Socks must be worn with all skate rentals.
  • No change or partial credit will be provided for any components of the package (including Food & Beverage Vouchers not redeemed during the event). This offer has no cash value.
  • All guests are to comply with the 2021 Terms and Conditions of Lakeside Brooklyn, LLC.

eventTitle: MANNHEIM  JEWEL YACHT May 22  11:30pm-4am  ( boarding 11:30pm-12am SHARP)
eventLocation: 2430 FDR Drive Service Rd East, New York, NY 10010
eventDescription:
Na.. Hallo Sexy Boys... GET. YOUR. TICKETS. NOW. That was your warning, Queen.

Join us on another journey at sea right here in fucking Manhattan.. no Ubers to Brooklyn and back ( saves you $60 already ) .. no secret locations either. .. this time we sail out at sea and use NYC as our back drop as we rock this fucking city to its core to the beats of NYC's own ........

>> DJ Shane Marcus <<

You dont want to miss this.

The Yacht is equipped with brandnew sound system and lights that will take you to the next level. Are..... you..... ready? Y'all dont hear me... Are you Ready!?

This time we enjoy ourselves with no fears or shut downs and no problems. The boat has a huge outdoor rooftop with bar and a downstairs area with bar too. Everyone will have ample space spread out and move about.

JEWEL Yacht

Boarding is 11:30-12am Sharp!

We sail 12-4am

Please don't be late or else you run the chance of getting left. We all want as much time out on the water as possible.

Coat check is available $5 CASH... please bring cash!

There are seriously limited tickets.. get one before they are gone. There is only so much room on a yacht.

Syport Marina 2430 FDR Drive Service Rd East ( 23rd Street and FDR Drive )

<<<<<<<<<

>>>>>>>>>

Danke viel Mals, und Aufweidersehen.....see you soon....

Mimosa Mondays - Memorial Day Brunch & Day Party
eventDescription:
We've got the most effective cure for your chronic "case of the Mondays". Every Monday holiday (Memorial Day, Labor Day, Martin Luther King Jr. Day, Presidents' Day, etc.), The Alumni Group presents Mimosa Mondays -- a brunch day party and happy hour that is the perfect end to your 3-day weekend! Come turn up with us before you head back to that grind on Tuesday. For just $20, you can add 1.5 hours of bottomless brunch cocktails, including an array of mimosas, to your brunch entree. eventTitle: CARLO LIO [ LET'S TECHNO  Sightseeing Cruise ] MDW/SUNDAY MAY 30
eventDescription:
TECHNO lovers this one is for you! Super thrilled to announced international DJ-Producer and Rawthentic label boss CARLO LIO.

The Toronto native preaches a gospel of mesmerizing beats. His expertly selected sets come up tempo, deep reaching and hard hitting. His straight-up techno groove mixing style translates into his impressive production record, with releases across heavyweight labels Do Not Sleep, Hot Creations, Inmotion Music, Intec, Mindshake Records, Turbo Recordings and more.

Opening set by Eddie Deville b2b Felipe 2F.

This is a Sightseeing cruise with the finest Techno grooving music. Be ready to dance all day long!

Capacity is very limited! 2 floors. Notice this is a fully heated boat both inside our main floor and outside on our deck/terrace floor with 360 sky views.

Tables packages strongly recommended and are including admission for 4/ 6 / 8 / 10 /12 people tables available.

You will be boarding the Jewel Cruise one of the finest boats in the city. Newly renovated with amazing LED builded in lights, top of the line sound with brand new interiors and last but not lease a breathtaking terrace with complete full view of New York. A 4 hours ride will take you around Hudson rive passing by the statute of liberty and experiencing beautiful NYC skyline sunset.

Boarding starts at 1pm.

Tables RSVP/ VIP or Any questions text 347.620.6024. (We only reply text).

General admission tickets now on sale while supplies last.

Food will be available for purchase.

*** Covid guidelines must be followed *** Strictly limited capacity/ Mask are mandatory/ Temperature taken at the door/ Outdoor Areas only/ Hand sanitizers/ Intimate + Secluded tables.

All sales are final. Rise or shine. This is a completely legal sightseeing cruise.

eventTitle: NYC Yacht Party Cruise
eventDescription:
(*For your safety, this venue will be operating at a limited capacity and following all Covid-19 protocols. Tickets will sell out fast!)

Join us for a fun & safe sunset sail by the Statue of Liberty, Brooklyn Bridge, Freedom Tower, etc. on a 100 ft, 2-deck private yacht with a live DJ! Enjoy lots of open air space along with covered areas for all to be comfortable.

Cruise through the city and take in the sights, with a panoramic view of the NYC skyline, while enjoying music and drinks for the night. Grab your friends or come alone and get ready to enjoy an experience you won't forget!

***Sanitizing stations, Masks required & Temperature readings upon entry***

* Live DJ Plays All The Hits

* All Ages (21 & Over) Are Welcome To Attend. Dress to impress.

* About 75% Come Alone So Don't Worry If You're Coming By Yourself

* 2 Fully Stocked Cash Bars So You Can Enjoy Amazing Cocktails

• The boat will sail rain or shine! The boat has two levels. Both levels have outdoor (covered) and indoor areas.

For 6pm cruise: Boarding starts at 5:45pm, Sail 6:30pm sharp. Yacht returns to Marina at 9:30pm.

For midnight cruises: Boarding starts at 11:30pm, Sail midnight. Yacht returns to the Marina at 3:30am.

• There is paid parking at the marina, or you can try to find parking on the street.

Covid-19 precautions:

*Bring/wear a mask

*If you feel sick please don’t come

*When greeting others please do not shake hands

eventTitle: Tea with Lady Mendl | Immersive High Tea and Brunch Experience
eventDescription:
"Immerse yourself in the beauty of classic NYC high society and let us pour you a glass of tea. Lady Mendl invites you to her home at Elsie Rooftop to enjoy the best in live cabaret theater and toast to a life in good taste. Won't you join us for tea?"

Elsie De Wolfe also known as Lady Mendl was an American actress and a prominent figure in American, French and English society. As a tribute to Lady Mendl, Elsie Rooftop celebrates with a High Tea experience of a curated English menu by including crafted tea blends and cocktails, as well as Parisian theatrical immersive acts.

THE ELSIE ROOFTOP

Tea and Brunch Service Includes:

Spanish Grilled Cheese (2) | Manchego cheese, prosciutto, medjool dates, sourdough bread

Pan Con Lobster (2) | Cold poached lobster, grilled toast

Black Angus Beef Sliders (2)| Manchego cheese, arugula, plum tomato

Spanish Casserole (2) | Free-range brown eggs, sourdough, seasonal vegetables

One Pot of Tea to Share (One Pot for Every Two People)

Assam Black Tea | Jasmine Petal Tea

Mint Verbena Tea | Herbal Chamomile Tea

Tamayokucha Green Tea | Earl Grey Tea

**Spike your tea pot with your favorite spirit for an additional $15

Hot Tea-Infused Cocktails | 16

Spiced Pear Toddy

Assam Black Tea, Ron Zapaca 23yr Rum, Spiced Pear Liqueur, Cinnamon, Cardamom, Sugar

Bourbon Peach Green Tea

Tamayokucha Green Tea, Old Forester Bourbon, Peach Schnapps, Honey, Lemon Juice

Chamomile Honey Toddy

Herbal Chamomile Tea, Ginger Root, Remy Martin VSOP, Limoncello, Honey, Lemon Juice

Brown Sugar Mint Toddy

Mint Verbena Tea, Bulleit Bourbon, Brown Sugar, Lemon Juice

Jasmine Kiss Tea

Jasmine Petal Tea, Ketel One Vodka, Pomegranate Juice, Honey, Lime Juice

Earl Grey Old Fashioned

Earl Grey Infused Elijah Craig Bourbon, Sugar, Angostura Bitters, Orange Bitters

*All ticket include Tea service

**Excludes Sales Taxes, Gratuity, Cocktails, and Tea Pot Spike Option

***First Seating Starts at 11:30am, Experience begins at 12pm ***Second Seating Starts at 2:30pm, Experience begins at 3pm

Thank you! Your compliance will help keep our events safe for all to enjoy.

eventTitle: BRUNCH MADNESS DAY PARTY
THE BLACK PARADE RETURNS - AGAIN!
eventDescription:
Our first post-lockdown Black Parade party was a lot of fun, and we are excited to be returning for round two!

------------------------------------------

THE BLACK PARADE [Emo & Pop Punk]

Jet, Swabby & Nekosiren play all the songs you love by the likes of Fall Out Boy * Yellowcard, Jimmy Eat World * My Chemical Romance * All Time Low * New Found Glory * Blink 182 * AFI, Panic! At The Disco * Good Charlotte * Falling in Reverse * A Day To Remember * Paramore & much more! Requests Welcome!

It's all going down at Drom in Manhattan's East Village. This will be a 21+ event and the party starts at 8pm-12am.

------------------------------------------

All precautions will be taken to keep everyone safe. Temperatures will be checked at the door. Tickets are very limited in order to maintain social distancing. You must wear a mask for entry. We will have enough seating for all. You must wear a mask unless you are at a table. You will be allowed to dance near your table but we ask you to remain 6' from people not in your group. If you leave your table, you must put your mask back on. According to NY regulations, a food purchase will be required if you are buying drinks (menu can be viewed here).

eventTitle: Sunset Party Yacht Cruise Around NYC
eventDescription:
Are you ready to mingle and party on this beautiful, huge yacht!!?? Come enjoy breathtaking sunset views on this fun and safe sunset cruise through NYC and sail by the Brooklyn Bridge, The Statue of Liberty, and the beautiful New York City Skyline on this spacious vessel to let loose with your squad on a 100 ft, 2-deck private yacht!

***Sanitizing stations & Masks available + Temperature readings upon entry so we can create a safe haven for our attendees***

Dance the night away on the Hottest Yacht Party Cruise with the best DJs while enjoying the the NYC Skyline! Sail through the city and take in the sights while you enjoy music and drinks for the night. Grab your friends or come alone and get ready to enjoy an experience you won't forget!

* Live DJ & Dance Floor (DJ Plays All The Hits)

* All Ages (21 & Over) Are Welcome To Attend. Dress to impress

* Much Of The Crowd Is Single So It's A Great Place To Meet That Special Someone!

* About 70% Come Alone So Don't Worry If You're Coming By Yourself

* 2 Fully Stocked Cash Bars So You Can Enjoy Amazing Cocktails

* Live DJ & Dance Floor (DJ Plays All The Top Hits, Dance Music, Hip Hop and More)

* Dress Code - Neat and/or Stylish - No Tank Tops, Gym Wear Or Baseball Caps (You Don't Have To Get Overly Dressed Up -- Some People Dress Up And Others Stay Semi Casual)

* A Wide Assortment Of Food Is Available For Purchase On The Yacht

* Please Arrive No Later Than The Listed Event Start Time

WHERE THE BOAT IS LOCATED: Skyport Marina at 23rd St. & FDR Drive

A recent review of one of our past cruises:

"I had an absolute blast! I came by myself and wasn't sure exactly what to expect but to my pleasant surprise everyone was super friendly and I met a whole bunch of people right away. A lot of people also came on their own so everyone was excited to get know other people. The DJ was outstanding and the views were AMAZING! I tested out my photography skills and got some great pics. I can't wait to go back on another cruise!"

- Melissa D., NYC

eventTitle: RSVLTS Official Hoboken, NJ  Meetup
eventDescription:
Update: May 13, 2021 (11:50 AM)

All the tickets were scooped up in a matter of minutes but since you're from New Jersey we'd like to give you the opportunity to attend and snag one of these epic limited-edition shirts at the event.

At 12:00PM ET (May 13, 2021) we're going to open up a few dozen more tickets for Hoboken/NJ/NYC area residents.

In the spirit of fairness, please only RSVP if you can actually attend. That way everyone who wants to be there can actually score a ticket.

--------

It's been a while since we all got together for a RSVLTS Meet-up, so now that things are starting to get a bit back to normal we're going to throw a bash in our hometown. All are invited to our fourth RSVLTS Meet-up (and the best one yet), so spread the word!

More details to come very soon, so RSVP now and stay tuned!

Date: Saturday, May 22, 2021

Time: 12:00 PM ET

Location: Pier 13 Hoboken (1301 Sinatra Dr N, Hoboken, NJ 07030)

Terms: Having a ticket does not guarantee entry or any promo. Event is strictly first come first serve. 21+ or must be accompanied by a parent. Tickets are strictly non transferable. More detail will be coming shortly.

eventTitle: Everybody Loves The 90's Bottomless Brunch & Day Party BK Edition
eventDescription:
The 70’s were groovy, the 80’s were totally awesome, but everybody knows that the 90’s were downright dope! 90’s fashion, flava, and especially the MUSIC were everything! Well, we at The Alumni Group are yearning for those times, and we especially miss the soundtrack that filled our days -- from gritty hip hop to sultry soul music to boy bands! So on Sunday, May 30th we’re throwing back to the 90’s at Everybody Loves The 90's Brunch & Day Party at Now & Then NYC! Add $25 to the price of your entrée and enjoy 90 minutes of bottomless brunch cocktails (Mimosa, Bellini, Sangria, and Rum Punch! NYC's Hottest DJ(DJ E Class) will be spinning classic 90’s hip hop and R&B to keep you and your crew moving while you eat and drink. If you miss this, you’re buggin ‘cause this brunch will be phat, yo! Word up!

Due to the Covid-19 pandemic we are mandating that everyone wear a mask and maintain social distancing. Large parties will be capped at 10. If your party is larger than 10 you will be sat at separate tables.

***Birthday Packages***

-Everyone in party must be present at time of reservation in order to redeem.

-Table decorations and balloons are allowed.

-Outside Cakes/Cupcakes allowed at no additional charge.

-2 hour seating limit maybe imposed.

It’s a Celebration Package

Party of 10+ receives 1 complimentary bottle of champagne.

Every Day We Lit Package

Party of 20+ receives 1 complimentary brunch for guest of honor and 1 complimentary bottle of champagne.

I’m the s#!+ package

Party of 30+ receives complimentary brunch for guest of honor and 2 complimentary bottles of champagne.

Everybody loves me I’m so fly package

Party of 40+ receives 2 complimentary brunches and 2 complimentary bottles of champagne.

If you have any questions or you wish to redeem any of the above packages please contact organizer Frandy (917) 299-8173

For Personalized/Custom flyers please email AlumniGroupENT@gmail.com (Minimum 2 weeks advance notice required)

Please Note: Brunch is NOT FREE. You will need to pay your server at the conclusion of brunch.

****Please use #TAGBRUNCH when sharing socially.****

eventTitle: Rogue Grand Opening in NYC!
eventDescription:
Rogue is opening it's very first brick and mortar location in the heart of the LES on Saturday, June 5th! Come out for the best curated vintage and designer clothing from the 1960s-2000s, jewelry, accessories, and capsule collections from the personal closets of Vienna Skye, Victoria Paris, and Alexander Roth. We will be stocked with both men's & women's clothing, note that everything it first come first serve. We will be restocking the racks with new items as the day goes on. We can't wait to see you!

Due to COVID restrictions, capacity of the shop is limited and this event if first come, first serve. We appreciate your patience and understanding during these times.
